mapper.select: SELECT st_seq, mb_id, st_title, st_content, st_create_at, st_update_at FROM jsp.study order by st_update_at desc
SELECT st_seq, mb_id, st_title, st_content, st_create_at, st_update_at FROM jsp.study where st_seq = #{stSeq}
SELECT st_seq, mb_id, st_title, st_content, st_create_at, st_update_at FROM jsp.study WHERE st_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stTitle}, '%') ORDER BY st_update_at DESC;
SELECT st_seq, mb_id, stup_original_file_name, stup_new_file_name, stup_file_path, stup_file_size FROM jsp.stview_board where st_seq = #{stSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.stfiles ( st_seq, mb_id, stup_original_file_name, stup_new_file_name, stup_file_path, stup_file_size ) VALUES ( #{stSeq}, #{mbId}, #{stupOriginalFileName}, #{stupNewFileName}, #{stupFilePath}, #{stupFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.study SET st_seq=#{stSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, st_title=#{stTitle}, st_content=#{stContent}, st_update_at=now() WHERE st_seq=#{stSeq}

UPDATE jsp.stfiles SET st_seq=#{stSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, stup_original_file_name=#{stupOriginalFileName}, stup_new_file_name=#{stupNewFileName}, stup_file_path=#{stupFilePath}, stup_file_size=#{stupFileSize} WHERE st_seq=#{stSeq}
